p:
The Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-analyses guidelines served as the template for reporting the present review (Supplementary TableÂ 1, Appendix). This review is registered in the PROSPERO International Prospective Register of Systematic Reviews, registration number CRD42018104829. For this systematic review and meta-analysis, we used the same methodology as in already published meta-analysis of prevalence studies for chikungunya fever
10 .
